snippet: Jeremy Lin scored 14 points, but he made just 6 of 16 shots, turned the ball over six times and was suffocated for most of the afternoon by an aggressive Celtics defense.
abstract: Boston Celtics defeat New York Knicks, 115-111, in overtime.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin scored 14 points, but he made just 6 of 16 shots, turned the ball over six times and was suffocated for most of the afternoon by an aggressive Celtics defense.

headline.seo: Celtics Top Knicks to Spoil Harvard Grad Lin’s Return to Boston
headline.main: A Month Has Changed Everything, and Nothing
headline.print_headline: A Month Has Changed Everything, And Nothing
